skills.skill: Synthesis, Lint, CDC, STA Design Tool
DDR Interface, PCIe, Ethernet, MIPI, AXI Bus, Image/Video Processing, ARM CPU, AMBA Bus Protocols, Low-Speed System Peripheral Bus

duties_responsibilities.duty: Work on SOC/ASIC Front-End design, Ethernet networking ASIC/system design, Microarchitecture specification writing, HDL language usage, and scripting language utilization.
Utilize SoC design methodologies, ASIC Front-End simulation tool, synthesis, Lint, CDC, and STA design tool for the design process.
Apply strong knowledge of DDR Interface, PCIe, Ethernet, MIPI, AXI bus, Image/Video processing, ARM CPU, AMBA bus protocols, and low-speed system peripheral bus in design activities.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Electrical Engineering or related field (Master's preferred)
